question:
The Pradhan Mantri Kaushal Vikas Yojana (PMKVY):
  1. provides monetary reward to trainees on assessment and certification
  2. will primarily focus on skill training requirements of the labour market including the unorganized sector
  3. will be implemented by Ministry of Labour and Employment
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: <u>Third statement is incorrect</u> because the scheme will be implemented by the new Ministry of Skill Development and Entrepreneurship through the National Skill Development Corporation (NSDC).
